title: Corridor Geodesic REVAMP
author: Liz Miyuna
content: So uh, meowdy! It's been a minute. So what have we been up to? To make a very long story short, this project became way bigger than we expected! Progress on CorGeo was slow for a bit while we figured out what direction we wanted to take the game in. And we had to pretty much re-build the whole game from the ground up since the old codebase was a mess. But things are back in full swing, and I am stupid excited for everyone to try out the new demo when it's ready! (Which will be soon-ish (probably...))

title: Corridor Geodesic Alpha Testing Announcement
author: Liz Miyuna
content: Test out early development builds for our new mind-bending puzzle game Corridor Geodesic! This is our first game project using the Unity version of the Riven Framework. If all goes according to plan, this test will confirm that the framework is ready for some heavy-duty projects!
